revision.text:
{{Actor| | type = Monster | name = Peasant | class = Peasant5 | game = Strife | doomednum = 132 | convid = 10 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:StrifeHumanoid|StrifeHumanoid]]→[[Classes:Peasant|Peasant]]→Peasant5
A peasant wearing red tunic. Appears as Derwin in the Warehouse in MAP04: Power Station and as Harris in the Tavern in MAP33, which is a leftover from the teaser version of the game. {| border="0" |- !width=7%|Map!!width=14%|Name!!width=76%|Notes |- | MAP04 || {{dw|Derwin}} || Bad guy (Has been selling kids to the Order) who needs to be killed so you can get his ear for the {{Class|Peasant22|governor}}. |- | MAP33 || {{dw|Harris}} || Harris instance in the tavern. Not to be confused with the Harris in what is {{Class|Peasant10|Rowan}}'s room in MAP02, where it is {{Class|Peasant4}}. |} ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR Peasant5 : {{Class|Peasant}} { {{Property|Translation}} 0 {{Property|Speed}} 7 }
